channel.title: emacs on rwkey
channel.description: Recent content in emacs on rwkey

item.title: emacs 快速入门
item.description: break line: ctrl + e, ctrl + j / ctrl + m save file: ctrl + x, ctrl + s exit: ctrl + x, k, enter terminate input: ctrl + g cut: ctrl + w copy: alt + w paste: ctrl + y cut to end: ctrl + k delete one character after: ctrl + d delete one character before: delete delte one word after: alt + d delte one word before: alt + del
